name: acm-industry-panel
description: ACM officer explains how to submit questions and access recordings for the panel night.

events.content: Anyone know if the ACM industry panel will take live questions or only pre-submitted?
Submit questions via https://acmcalpoly.typeform.com/panel by Wed 5 p.m. We group similar ones and still leave 10 minutes for live Q&A.
Yes! Slides plus the YouTube link hit #clubs-resources within 48 hours.
